CasperVPN is a VPN client software that encrypts your data while browsing the internet. Through this encryption CasperVPN ensures top level security, total anonymity and ultimate privacy for its users.

CasperVPN creates an encrypted tunnel between your computer and our servers. This encrypted tunnel eliminates any possible attempts to hack or view you information by any third party such as your Internet Service Provider (ISP) or your local Wi-Fi operator. Encryption is a complicated task that generally relies on well-tested implementation and advanced mathematics. CasperVPN uses advanced encryption algorithms to protect your data and secure your communications.

When connected to CasperVPN, your ISP only sees the encrypted traffic passing through our VPN servers, but they cannot decrypt the data to analyze its content. So basically you can by pass any restrictions or censorships put by your ISP through CasperVPN. In CasperVPN we believe that the internet is a free global system of interconnected networks that should not be restricted or bound by any entity. And in support to our belief we created CasperVPN to provide internet freedom, since this is the way it should be!

In CasperVPN we have a very high level of speed and security for broadband Internet connections. We own our servers and manage a global network to deliver the fastest VPN speed. We write optimized code to deliver extremely fast VPN connections with top level security. Since we own our servers there is no third party that can interfere between us and our user. Security and privacy is our number one concern, that’s why we believe that no third party should by any way or circumstance have access to any of our servers to ensure user anonymity. And to add an extra layer of encryption we created our software in a way that even our system admen’s cannot track user activity, nor are any logs stored on our servers.

CasperVPN virtually places you in a different location or country. Using CasperVPN you can avoid leaving digital footprint by hiding your real IP address and your geographical location. CasperVPN believes everyone has the right to keep their personal information private.

CasperVPN allows you to browse the internet securely using a set of encryption protocols. User can accordingly switch between these protocols and select which VPN protocol is best suitable according to your activity. CasperVPN will summarize the difference between different VPN protocols and guide you on how to choose the best encryption protocol that suites your needs.

CasperVPN goes beyond traditional VPN solutions by providing a high level of service quality and user experience.

Our goal is to keep you informed and protected from the risks and vulnerabilities of today’s cyber world. We achieve this by exceeding your expectations with a fast, secure and reliable service.

We believe you have the right to protect your privacy from predators and secure you data from theft and meddlesome.

To target our objective, we have built an extremely secure infrastructure to ensure encryption, anonymity and top level VPN security to our customers.

Our sincere mission is protecting our user's privacy. Building on this vision, we created a software that does not store any logs in our system. Even more our infrastructure is built in a way where system operators themselves are not capable of tracking user activity.

All Internet traffic is exposed to the public. ISP’s, third party trackers, thieves and hackers are able to identify your identity, locate your location and track your activities through your IP address. A Virtual Private Network (VPN) is a secure private network that operates between our user’s devices and our VPN servers. This network encapsulates and encrypts all your traffic via a secure tunnel to our servers before going online. This makes it impossible for ISP’s (internet service providers) and hackers to track your activity or peak into your personal data.

Through a VPN, firewalls will not be able to block your traffic even when using deep packet inspection. Since, your data will be encrypted via a VPN tunnel, making it impossible for firewalls to analyze encrypted packets or see user activity. Thus VPN clients can access whatever geo restricted content they please.

For most countries, VPN’s are legal. We have the right to protect our privacy and secure our data while using the internet; as a matter of fact we think it’s our duty to do so. VPN is a tool used by companies and organization and even governments to ensure that their data is protected and secure. Therefore we as users have the right to take the same measures when it comes to our personal data.

Through a VPN, users can hide their identity by using a virtual IP address and virtual location, which means that all your activity is unknown and meaningless to anyone wishing to take a look. However before choosing a VPN you have to trust your VPN provider, and this is what we provide at CasperVPN, trust liability and security is what we share with our clients. CasperVPN keeps no logs. User is free to do anything he wishes to do whereas his personal data will be totally secure and remain entirely private even to VPN operators.

Technically speaking, yes! That’s why it is very important that users trust their VPN providers. In fact VPN users must avoid trusting VPN providers that offers free VPN services. However it all comes down to how your VPN provider deals with your data. At CasperVPN, we do not keep any online activity logs for our users under any circumstances. CasperVPN has built its VPN infrastructure in a way that our VPN operators themselves are not capable of tracking users or storing any logs. And in order to make our users feel more secure and have trust in us we are ready and open to give our users answers and data proving our extremely secure infrastructure when ever needed at support@caspervpn.com. At the end of the day security, liability and privacy is why we exist.

Since CasperVPN offers OpenVPN protocol, what ISP’s can see is that user is browsing a secure website using a secure socket layer (HTTPS) which is normal and used by most of websites such as Google, Face book and PayPal.
You just have to download and install the application on your device, and then press the connect button. Basically it’s that simple!
In CasperVPN we believe that the privacy and security of our users is of ultimate importance. Therefore we procure strict administrative policies to protect your privacy and security.

E-mail address and payment Data. Clients who use optional control panel will receive a temporary cookie. Google may store a cookie basically in Google analytics. Feel free to opt out with Google\'s plugin

Email is used to subscribe your information for payment certificate and private internet access and for promo offers only. All payment data are used to manage client login payments and cancelation. Cookies and Google analytics data are used to improve and test our website. In addition our server logs are regularly pruned. CasperVPN does not collect or log any traffic on its virtual private network.

CasperVPN strives to protect its user’s privacy rights and to provide them with all the right subpoena requests. All compliances are well revised and scrutinized by our legal department. If we are asked to provide user information, we will fight with all our recourses against any attempt by any party requesting us to reveal this information for whatever reason or claim. Plus if we have to reveal information it will be the information we have which happens to be extremely limited in our case. In addition this request should be backed up by a court order or else we will not take it into consideration. CasperVPN is not participating in any illegal or unconstitutional act we just believe in our user’s right to privacy. CasperVPN does not share your private information with any third party aside from the disclosures already made in this privacy policy. However, if you wish to inquire into how CasperVPN does not share user’s personal information with third parties feel free to contact us at support@caspervpn.com.

These are the terms of service that you agree on by registering and using the services of CasperVPN. It is only under these conditions that CasperVPN allows users to use its service. CasperVPN is not a service to be used for criminal activities. It is an Internet security and privacy service. You accept not to violate any law of any jurisdiction that you are originating from. It is the users responsibility to know and comprehend any and all relevant laws related to any jurisdiction or venue that concerns you and your actions. CasperVPN will not be liable in any way or form for actions done by its users. This includes any criminal or civil liability for harm, executed or not executed beyond any money paid for CasperVPN services by any individual. You agree to preserve your username/password and CasperVPN system from unauthorized usage. You are responsible for every single action that occurs on CasperVPN where your username/password was used for establishing the VPN connection. You agree not to use our services for port scanning, sending spam, sending opt-in e-mail, scanning for open relays or open proxies, sending unsolicited e-mail or any version or type of e-mail sent in vast quantities even if the e-mail is lastly sent off through another server. It is forbidden to launch any pop-ups from our service. You accept not to assault in any way or form any other network or computer while using our services. CasperVPN is intolerant about the exploitation of children photographically, digitally or in any other way.

You accept not to give or share your username and password to others. CasperVPN, owners, employees, agents and others that are involved with CasperVPN services are not in any way or form liable for any harm of any sort executed or not executed, resulting or arising through or from the use of any account registered with CasperVPN services. In any event CasperVPN will never be liable for any harm caused by miss usage of the service by its users. And this includes but is not limited to, attorney fees or court costs irrespective of any laws that may address it otherwise.

Criminal Activity – any client who commits any of these criminal actions: use of stolen credit cards, credit card fraud, PayPal fraud, bank fraud, e-gold fraud, Paysera fraud, WebMoney fraud, Bitcoin fraud, mail fraud, extortion, blackmail, kidnapping, rape, murder, sale of stolen credit cards, sale of stolen goods, sending email or operating websites to perform identity theft, hacking, harming, phishing, spamming of any form, in or through our service using our resources leaves with a terminated account. This is the whole agreement. CasperVPN may rewrite the terms of service from time to time. The terms of service become active from the time it is updated at our website. It is the responsibility of the client to check for the new Terms of Service every once in a while. CasperVPN can terminate any user account for violating terms of service instantly without any refund and notice. Or suspend the account until further clarification or investigation of the user. If your account has been suspended you must contact us in order to see if the case can be rectified. We shall wait a substantiated period of time before we close a user account permanently and shut down all billing.

CasperVPN does not monitor, store or record logs for any VPN user. We do not store connection time stamps, used bandwidth, traffic logs or IP addresses. We are not related to any form of censorship and we will never give away your personal information to any third party. We do not fulfill any information request unless it comes with a court order of competent jurisdiction. No one can have access to our servers since they are in an extremely secure environment. In addition no user activity will be stored on our servers. We are and will always protect your privacy.

CasperVPN does not keep or store any logs. However, we need to keep some information about the users that are necessary for our existence and user support. • User e-mail – to send the latest CasperVPN news and to retrieve a lost password. • Username – it is necessary to make a VPN connection. • Payment information with your preferred payment gateway– we store billing information in case of a refund request.

You have a right to cancel your account at any time by contacting us. If the account gets canceled the money you have spent on the VPN account will not be reimbursed. Your account must be active in order to cancel it.

By logging in to any CasperVPN service, you agree to the CasperVPN Terms and conditions of the Service including all other policies incorporated by reference. These terms and conditions may be periodically updated, by accepting these terms and conditions you are also accepting any information about future changes to this agreement if applied.
You can view our Terms of Service here.

Payment will be charged to Coogle play store Account at confirmation of purchase. 

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 

Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. 

Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. 

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
